Package BoringGame

Class ResourceMenu

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.Shape
org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape
BoringGame.ResourceMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer, org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable, org.jsfml.graphics.Transformable
public class ResourceMenu
extends org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape
implements java.util.Observer
Class representing the resource menu in the top left of the screen. This class implements the functionality for selecting resources, and shows changes in the resources when new ones are aquired or lost.

  • Method Details

    • changeSeasonIcon

      public void changeSeasonIcon​(int i)
      The resource menu contains the icon that represents the current season. This function is used to change the seasons icon
      Parameters:
      i -

    • getRectangleArray

      public org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape[] getRectangleArray()
      This function adds all the JSFML Rectangles used to draw the resource menu into one array and returns it. This is useful in the class that implements this menu, so that the rectangles can be drawn onto the screen
      Returns:
      The array of rectangles that make up the menu

    • getRectangleArray

      public org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape[] getRectangleArray​(int i)
      This function adds all the JSFML Rectangles used to draw the resource menu into one array and returns it. This is useful in the class that implements this menu, so that the rectangles can be drawn onto the screen
      Returns:
      The array of rectangles that make up the menu

    • getCounter

      public org.jsfml.graphics.Text[] getCounter()
      This function returns the array of JSFML Text, these are used to display the number of resources in the menu.
      Returns:
      Array of Text

    • increment

      public void increment​(int index)
      Function called everytime a resource was bought in the shop. Used to increment the text counter.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item bought

    • decrement

      public void decrement​(int index)
      Function called everytime a resource is used to plant. Used to decrement the text counter.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item used

    • decrement

      public void decrement​(int index, int value)
      Function called everytime a resource is used to plant. Used to decrement the text counter, this time by a certain value.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item used
      value - value to decrement by

    • getIndexVal

      public int getIndexVal​(int index)
      Gets the text value of an item in a certain index in the reource menu.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the item
      Returns:
      value of the text counter at this index

    • increment

      public void increment​(int index, int value)
      Function called everytime a resource was bought in the shop. Used to increment the text counter.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item bought
      value - The value to increment by

    • selectIcon

      public void selectIcon​(float mouseX, float mouseY)
      Called everytime a mouse click occurs. Checks if any of the Icon in the resource menu have been clicked, if yes, then the corresponding one is marked as selected and it's icon is changed. If there already was one selected, it is marked as unselected and it's icon is changed.

    • getSelectedIndex

      public int getSelectedIndex()
      Returns the index of the resource that is currently selected
      Returns:
      index of the resource that is currently selected

    • update

      public void update​(java.util.Observable clock, java.lang.Object o)
      This function is called by the Clock object (Every 5 seconds), once the player has bought the final upgrade. The final upgrade gives the player 1 coin per 5 seconds
      Specified by:
      update in interface java.util.Observer

    • deselect

      public void deselect()
      Function used for deselecting. This is used for example when the users plans seeds untill they run out, then the current seed is deselected automatically
